verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
Give us vision of the beauty of the Lord,
Give us vision of the beauty of the Lord.
Holy Spirit, open up our eyes,
To behold the beauty of the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Give us vision of the Lord upon the Throne,
Give us vision of the Lord upon the Throne.
Holy Spirit, open up our eyes,
To behold the beauty of the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Give us vision of our lives as royal Priests,
Give us vision of our lives as royal Priests
Holy Spirit, open up our eyes,
To behold the beauty of the Lord.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Give us vision of His longing for His Bride,
Give us vision of His longing for His Bride.
Holy Spirit, open up our eyes,
To behold the beauty of the Lord.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Give us vision of the fullness of the Lord,
Give us vision of the fullness of the Lord.
Holy Spirit, open up our eyes,
To behold the beauty of the Lord.
